availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Sarena M. Cartwright Goodwin Redd (Trigg County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of James A. Cartwright and Adeline Graves Cartwright. Married to John F. Goodwin in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on September 13, 1849. Married to George K. Redd. Mother of George G. Redd. Resident in Trigg County in 1852.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 274.
